p: Data are mean ± standard deviation (SD). Differences between groups were assessed using GraphPad Prism, version 5 (GraphPad Software Inc., San Diego, CA, USA) by a paired Student's t-test (biofilm, cell invasion and real time RT-PCR experiments) and the log-rank (Mantel-Cox) test ( G. mellonella survival assays). P ≤ 0.05 indicated statistical significance.
